encouraged. I strongly believe in teamwork and wish always to be flexible and
adaptive to change. I shall excel in my work when provided with pleasant and
friendly work atmosphere, with all freedom to prove myself CAREER SUMMARY:- Civil Professional with over 08years09months of highly
successful and hardcore experience in Construction field as Site Engineer. (From
June 2009 to till date)

Location : Saudi Arabia , Riyadh `

Responsebility: site excavation trench level and R.c.c pump station work

Foundation
5) From :Januvary 2010 to March 2011 Main Contractor :East Coast Construction& Industries Ltd Project : Under Ground Drainage System Clint :State of Govt of Pwd Orissa Designation : Grauate Trainee Engineer Responsibilities:Laying of Pipe ,Excavation Level work,Supervising work
6) From: June 2009 to December 2009 Main Contractor: Vishal Infrastructure Pvt Ltd. Client :Airport Authority of India (AAI) Project: International Airport runway extending work at Kolkata Designation: Junior Engineer Responsibilities:Material Testing,Concrete Batching Plant Quality Control
Responsibilities: To carry out the work as per drawing and specification. Successfully carried out the work with time and Quality. `
Successfully implementing company Quality Management Systems Carrying out Site Inspections of structural and architectural works to specification. To ensure that proper methodology and instructions are followed in various execution activities. To impart training related to various site activities and successfully co-ordinate the same . Helping out in Execution works which include formwork, shuttering and reinforcement. Prepare daily progress and submit to planning team. Maintaining complete records of work done at site Co-ordination with planning and billing team for successfully carry out the project. To plan the work to be done and organize things so that deadlines are met To watch and inspect the construction and assure that it is done in full accordance with the plans and specifications. Review and approve Shop Drawings of equipment to be installed to assure the equipment meets or exceeds the specifications (often done with the Project Engineer). Meet with the General Contractor to keep the project on time and on budget. Execution teams are the part of the site management team, and takes some of the responsibility for security, health and safety, and organizing and supervising materials and people Site Execution Key Skills: Hardworking, Innovative, Creative, Good Leadership Quality, Teamwork, and ability to achieve Targets
in stipulated period of time Using my technical and management skills, knowledge of construction methods & equipment, along with Principles of financial, planning and managing, ability to turn the design of other engineers into successful Projects with utmost care in Quality and Safety Aspects. Technical Education Background:

Bachelor of Civil Engineering Year of Passing 2009

Area of Interest: Site Execution, Quality Control,Levelling work
